title: The Pondhouse - A Magical Place
details: Romantic hideaway! This property has the lush beauty and privacy of Hana, without the drive! Only 15-20 minutes to the airport, 10 minutes to beaches, 2 minutes to restaurants and shops...on a private gated property with organic nursery. BEAUTIFUL!

title: Exceptional property private beach
details: The house is located in a beautiful natural park, fully enclosed,supervised by a couple of caseiros
amenities: Indoor fireplace, Free parking on premises, Wifi, Heating

title: La Salentina, sea, nature & relax
details: In the far south of the Salento peninsula, along the coastal road Otranto-Santa Maria di Leuca, the town is located, Guardiola, a real balcony on the Adriatic.Here, nestled between the Mediterranean, there is La Salentina
amenities: Wifi, Kitchen, Free Parking, Air Conditioning

title: Amazing view - Moderne apartment
details: Architectural house in north Iceland.This is one of the apartments in Villa Lola, located in Valaheii near Akureyri,the capital of north Iceland.The villa is located in the exclusive residence area of Akureyri.This location offers you a quiet atmosphere and a touch of the nature. You will have a view over the bay and Akureyri. In the winter time you can enjoy the aurora borealis and in the summer time the midnight sun.

title: Romantic Cabana with view
details: Located in the coffee region, in the Andean mountains of Colombia, South America, a charming cabana made from bamboo, with a great view and a sendero or pathway through the bamboo forest which criss-crosses our 5 acre organic farm, leading down to a stream. A place to relax and commune with nature.

title: I SETTE CONI - TRULLO EDERA
details: Spend a unforgettable holiday in the enchanting surroundings of the town of Cisternino reachable from the near airports of Bari and Brindisi. Trullo Edera offers a heaven of peace and tranquillity, set in an elevated position with a stunning view.It's the perfect place if you like nature. You can stay under an olive tree reading a good book, you can have a walk in the small country streets or go to the nearest beaches.You can even easily visit any of the sights in Apulia such as the caves of Castellana, the trulli of Alberobello, the baroque cities of Lecce and Martina Franca, the excavations of Egnazia, the zoosafari of Fasano, Castel del Monte with Fredericks castle, Grottaglie famous for its ceramics, Taranto, Brindisi and Lecce museums.Prices vary on period and are to be considered included: in-outcoming cleanings, towels, sheets, water, gas, electricity.

title: Beautiful condo by the beach
details: Newly renovated spacious condo 2 blocks from the beach, walking distance from shops and restaurants,steps from public transport. Queen bed,full size sofa,smart TV, Netflix, YouTube, etc,internet;everything new. Minutes from South Beach,perfect location.

title: Ocean View Malibu Hideaway
details: A delightful experience often compared with the French Riviera, incredible ocean views. Conveniently located only 23 miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), 15 minutes from Santa Monica, seconds from gorgeous beaches and mountain hikes. If this space is not available for your dates or you need more room we have another super cool larger loft apartment see our profile for the other listing.
amenities: Wifi, Kitchen, Free Parking, Cable TV

title: Unique Architecture Cave House
details: This spacious, unparalleled cave house, hanging on the cliffs of the caldera in the center of Oia, is part of a traditional complex of cave houses, owned & renovated by a family of architects.

title: The Cozy Palace
details: Let this be your Unique experience in Marrakech!

title: BALIAN TREEHOUSE w beautiful pool
details: The Balian treehouse is only a 3 minute walk away from the beach. From the veranda you can watch the sunrise in the morning, and enjoy the view of our beautiful garden (900m2) with pool.
amenities: Kitchen, Free parking, Wifi, Cable TV

title: A BEAUTIFUL LUXURY VILLA IN NORTH ICELAND
details: The villa is built on one floor with all modern day commodities: Three medium size bedrooms, large living room, and modern kitchen with all the usual equipments, terrace, Jacuzzi, free internet, garden, washing machine and dryer, TV, central heating, DVD, and very easy connection with closest airport and highway.The property offers the optimal mix between family relax and exploration of the beauty of the Norhern landscape. Located on a hill in the southwestern side of Eyjafjordur.
amenities: Free parking, Kitchen, Wifi, Hot Tub

title: Underground Hygge
details: This inspired dwelling nestled right into the breathtaking Columbia River Gorge mountainside. Reverently framed by the iconic round doorway, the wondrous views will entrance your imagination and inspire an unforgettable journey. Every nook of this little habitation will warm your sole, every cranny will charm your expedition of repose. Up the pathway, tucked into the earth, an unbelievable adventure awaits!

title: Casa Silvana
details: Ad OSTUNI in Centro Storico,a pochi passi da piazza Libertà caratteristico ed ampio monolocale ben arredato con tutti i confort.
points: Entire home,Sparkling clean,Great location,Great check-in experience
